name: DoMINIon (itch) (Bruhgames)
description:
Enemies move from the hole, to your castle. Your health is displayed on your castle and the wave you are in is displayed on the hole.

Place towers, walls and ground-tiles in the way of the enemies and defeat them, before they reach your castle.

How to Play:

Just click on the desired field and choose the tower you want to place in the shop. The Price is displayed in the clicked field and the amount of gold you have is shown in the bar on the right side as stacked coins.

Click the "?" button in the start menu for more information!
